`,(0,e.jsx)(s.pre,{children:(0,e.jsx)(s.code,{className:"language-cpp",children:`#include <iostream>\r
#include <vector>\r
using namespace std;\r
\r
int N, M, m[101], c;\r
vector<vector<int> > dp;\r
\r
int main()\r
{\r
	ios::sync_with_stdio(false);\r
	cin.tie(0);\r
	cout.tie(0);\r
\r
	cin >> N >> M;\r
	for (int i = 1; i <= N; i++)\r
		cin >> m[i];\r
	dp.resize(N + 1, vector<int>(10001, 0));\r
\r
	for (int i = 1; i <= N; i++)\r
	{\r
		cin >> c;\r
\r
		for (int j = 0; j <= 10000; j++)\r
		{\r
			dp[i][j] = dp[i - 1][j];\r
			if (j >= c)\r
				dp[i][j] = max(dp[i][j], dp[i - 1][j - c] + m[i]);\r
		}\r
	}\r
\r
	for (int j = 0; j <= 10000; j++)\r
	{\r
		if (dp[N][j] >= M)\r
		{\r
			cout << j;\r
			return 0;\r
		}\r
	}\r
\r
	return 0;\r
}
`})})]})}function R(a={}){let{wrapper:s}=a.components||{};return s?(0,e.jsx)(s,Object.assign({},a,{children:(0,e.jsx)(h,a)})):h(a)}var x=R;function z(a,s,n){throw new Error("Expected "+(s?"component":"object")+" `"+a+"` to be defined: you likely forgot to import, pass, or provide it."+(n?"\nIt\u2019s referenced in your code at `"+n+"` in `C:\\Users\\\uAC15\uB2E4\uD61C\\Desktop\\code\\psst54-blog-ts\\files\\post\\_mdx_bundler_entry_point-a305547b-5a02-4b3b-8859-f4c7db9cae53.mdx`":""))}return b(f);})();
